title: Dish, 1955
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Elongated oval, higher and more pointed on one end.  Three short legs.  Mottled glaze consisting of layers of blue, green, black and white sprayed over each other.  On inside, linear, oak leaf shaped design in black, en-circling foliated white stem.  Signature: "KEY-OBERG." (Incised)

tombstone.epitaph:
Dish, 1955.
1955. earthenware. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1955-64-3.
